cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 35 mi NNE of Tiburon, Haiti
cyclone.trajectory: moving north, then forecast to turn NNW and NW toward the southeastern, central and north-western Bahamas and later toward the Florida east coast
